law.catch_line: On or before October 1 of each year, the Trust shall submit a report to the Governor, the Maryland E...

text.section: On or before October 1 of each year, the Trust shall submit a report to the Governor, the Maryland Economic Development Commission, and, subject to § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the General Assembly.
The report shall include a complete operating and financial statement covering the operations of the Trust and summarize the activities of the Trust for the preceding fiscal year.
